long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
quantum-espresso fails to build from source for Fedora 24 on AArch64.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
quantum-espresso-5.3.0-8.fc24
How reproducible:
consistently
Steps to Reproduce: 1. On an AArch64 host: mock -r fedora-24-aarch64 quantum-espresso-5.3.0-8.fc24.src.rpm 2. 3.
Actual results:
error: Architecture is not included: aarch64
Expected results:
builds without errors.
Additional info:
This package is ExclusiveArch: x86_64 %{ix86} ppc64le. According to the comment:
# openblas-devel is exclusive
A patch has now been submitted to enable AArch64 builds of openblas.
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1355896
Using the patched version to fulfill the dependency, and adding 'aarch64' to the ExclusiveArch list, allows quantum-espresso to successfully build on AArch64.
